name: Demon RPG
description:
The Demon who ruled Hell, betrayed!
The outskirts of hell, the adventure of the demon begins to get back the throne.

Features
●If you merge the same item, you can get the next stronger item
●You can use various skills to lead effective combat and growth
●Craft swords, shields, and potions to defeat evil monsters
●More than 100 various items!
●Check twist plot in the end!

Please contact owings37@gmail.com for game-related inquiries.
